content:
On the line of collision in the Luhansk region, the Rushites fired at Nevsko and Bigorivka almost 100 times.

About thisinformsThe head of Lugansk Ova Artem Lisogor in his telegram channel, reports the Armyinform.

Aviation strikes were taken by the enemy of Nadiya and Bigorivka. Near the latter, the enemy had to pierce the defense, however, unsuccessfully.

Earlier the Armyinformreportedthat the invaders fired at 20 settlements of Kharkiv region: there are wounded.
title: From artillery, grenade launchers and tanks: the enemy fired at Luhansk almost 100 times
description: About it reports the head of Lugansk Ova Artem Lisogor in his telegram channel, reports ...
author: Army Inform
